column5: Leaving in 2 days and wondering what the going rate for a dozen minnows is currently in Canada (Red Lake Area)? Regardless the cost I'm going, just wondering what people are paying these days?
Leaving in 2 days and wondering what the going rate for a dozen minnows is currently in Canada (Red Lake Area)? Regardless the cost I'm going, just wondering what people are paying these days?
We paid 4.35 per dozen at camp in Ear Falls. That price includes PST and GST. That was about 3 weeks ago(mid August).
they're 2.25 if you buy them from a dealer in the Rainy area... $4 is about what you can expect from a resort.

On our way back from Lac Seul in July we stopped in Souix Narrows for a ice cream and there was a posting on a bulletin board stating he had the lowest minnows prices in the area. 3 KM south of Kilpatric road. Phone 807-226-5373 Did not state what the prices were but if it is on your way give him a call. Post his prices if you do call.
Our camp sold minnows for $3.50 a doz. I know the bait dealers in our area are selling them to resorts for $3.65 a doz. Leeches can be found at Best baits in Ear Falls, and nice quality.
Be sure to take along some Gulp baits. Try gulp minnows and leeches. I used them in early August on Gull Rock with great results.
